Name: ESR_EL2
Description: EL2が例外をトラップ後にVMを切り替える状況を考慮してRegister Arrayに追加

Name: VTTBR_EL2
Function: Virtualization Translation Table Base Address Register

Name: ICC_SRE_EL2
Function: System Register Enable Register for EL2

Name: ICH_AP0R0_EL2
Function: Interrupt Controller Hyp Active Priorities Register (0 0)

Name: ICH_AP1R0_EL2
Function: Interrupt Controller Hyp Active Priorities Register (1 0)

Name: ICH_EISR_EL2
Function: Interrupt Controller End of Interrupt Status Register

Name: ICH_ELRSR_EL2
Function: Interrupt Controller Empty List Register Status Register

Name: ICH_MISR_EL2
Function: Interrupt Controller Maintenance Interrupt State Register

Name: ICH_VMCR_EL2
Function: Interrupt Controller Virtual Machine Control Register

Name: CNTVOFF_EL2
Description: 最初にVMが起動する時のCNTPCT_EL0

Name: CNTHP_TVAL_EL2
Function: Counter-timer Hypervisor Physical Timer TimerValue register

Name: CNTHP_CTL_EL2
Function: Counter-timer Hypervisor Physical Timer Control register

Name: CNTHP_CVAL_EL2
Function: Counter-timer Hypervisor Physical Timer CompareValue register
